mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category(cate_no, cate_name, cate_cnt, cate_seqno, cate_visible) VALUES(category_seq.nextval, #{cate_name}, #{cate_cnt}, #{cate_seqno}, #{cate_visible})
mapper.select: SELECT cate_no, cate_name, cate_cnt, cate_seqno, cate_visible FROM category ORDER BY cate_no ASC
SELECT cate_no, cate_name, cate_seqno, cate_visible FROM categpry WHERE cate_name IN ( SELECT DISTINCT cate_name FROM category ) AND visible='Y' ORDER BY cate_seqno ASC

SELECT cate_no, cate_name, cate_cnt, cate_seqno, cate_visible FROM category
WHERE UPPER(cate_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY cate_seqno ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cate_cnt FROM category
WHERE UPPER(cate_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY cat_eseqno ASC
